settings.text: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template.

We believe that high-quality meat shouldn't just be reserved for special occasions. It should be a part of your everyday meals, too. That's why we offer a hassle-free subscription service that delivers premium quality meat to your doorstep on a regular basis.
Each box is thoughtfully curated by our expert butchers and inspired by the changing seasons, so you can experience a variety of flavors and textures throughout the year.
We've got a subscription plan to suit every taste and budget.

At Celeplate, we know that life can be unpredictable, and that's why we've designed our pay as you go plan to be flexible and hassle-free.

With our plan, you have the freedom to swap products freely, reschedule your delivery anytime, skip a delivery when you need to, and even cancel your subscription anytime.

We understand that things can change, and we want to make sure that our subscription fits your needs, not the other way around.

settings.title: Best sellers for pay as you go

settings.text:
Want to save some money while getting premium quality meat delivered to your doorstep? With our pre-paid plan, you can save up to 30% on regular deliveries of our high-quality meat.

Not only that, but you can also choose the frequency of your deliveries, skip or reschedule anytime, and even plan your deliveries using our customer portal. And if you ever have any questions or concerns, our excellent customer service team is always here to help.

settings.heading: What are the benefits of subscribing?
settings.row_content:
By subscribing, you can save time and money by having your meals or meat products delivered on a regular basis, without the need to constantly reorder.

Our subscription plans also offer flexibility, allowing you to easily reschedule, skip, or cancel your deliveries as needed.

Additionally, our pre-paid subscription plan offers savings up to 30% on regular deliveries.

settings.heading: How often will I receive deliveries?
settings.row_content:
For our Pay As You Go plan, you can choose however often you want to receive deliveries, whether that be weekly, bi-weekly or monthly.

For our Pre-paid plan, you can choose the frequency of your deliveries based on the plan you choose. You can even adjust the frequency of your deliveries at any time through your customer portal.

By subscribing, you will also be able to take advantage of our discounted prices, as well as our hassle-free rescheduling, skipping, and cancellation options.

settings.heading: Can I skip/reschedule a delivery or pause/cancel my subscription?
settings.row_content:
Yes, you can skip, reschedule a delivery or pause, cancel your subscription at any time by logging into your account and adjusting your delivery schedule.

You can also contact our customer service team to assist you with this. This is particularly helpful if you are going on vacation or need to adjust your delivery schedule for any reason.

At Celeplate, we work hard to fulfill your orders in a timely and efficient manner. Once an order has been fulfilled and shipped, we are unable to cancel it. However, for any scheduled orders in the future, you can easily cancel them through our customer portal or by contacting our customer service team.

Please note that if it's your first order and the close date hasn't passed yet, cancellation may not be possible. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and are committed to ensuring your satisfaction with our products and services.

settings.heading: How do I manage my subscription?
settings.row_content:
• Log in to your account
  • Subscription emails from Celeplate

To manage your subscription, simply log in to your account on our website using the email address associated with your subscription order. From there, through 'manage subscription' button, you can make changes, such as updating your delivery address, changing the frequency of your deliveries, or skipping a delivery.

It's important to note that when you place a subscription order, an account is not automatically created for you. You will need to create an account using the email address associated with your subscription order to manage your subscription.

Please note that you can also find a "Manage Subscription" button in the emails we send you. This will allow you to easily access your account and make any necessary changes.

Additionally, for security reasons, your portal's link will be renewed every 7 days. Please pay attention to the link renewal emails we will be sending you frequently, and make sure to use the most recent link when accessing your account.

settings.heading: How is payment processed for my subscription?
settings.row_content:
For Pay As You Go subscriptions, we will process payment right before each delivery. This means you only pay for what you receive, and you can cancel or reschedule anytime before the payment is processed.

For Pre-Paid subscriptions, payment is processed upfront for the entire subscription plan. You can choose the frequency of deliveries and easily manage your subscription through our customer portal. We offer a 30% discount for Pre-Paid subscriptions, so it's a great way to save money on regular deliveries.
